results.title: Expression of Cyr61 in ApoE-/- mice with chronic unilateral renal artery ligation
results.text_hl: In the RAL + @CHEMICAL_Irbesartan @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077405 @@@irbesartan@@@, RAL + @CHEMICAL_aliskiren @CHEMICAL_MESH:C446481 @@@aliskiren@@@ and RAL + @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ groups the staining within @<m>DISEASE_Plaque_Atherosclerotic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D058226 @@@atheroma@@@ was more patchy and diffuse than in the RAL group.

citations.NLM: Pathak AS, Rojas M, Stouffer GA. Expression of Cyr61 in ApoE-/- mice with chronic unilateral renal artery ligation Sci Rep. 2021 Feb 11;11(1):3606. PMID: 33574403

results.title: Mechanisms of atherosclerotic plaque stabilization for a lipophilic calcium antagonist amlodipine.
results.text_hl: Mechanisms of @<m>DISEASE_Plaque_Atherosclerotic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D058226 @@@atherosclerotic plaque@@@ stabilization for a lipophilic @CHEMICAL_Calcium @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002118 @@@calcium@@@ antagonist @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@.

results.title: Effects of amlodipine, atorvastatin and combination of both on advanced atherosclerotic plaque in APOE*3-Leiden transgenic mice.

results.title: Raman spectroscopic investigation of atorvastatin, amlodipine, and both on atherosclerotic plaque development in APOE*3 Leiden transgenic mice.
results.text_hl: In addition it is demonstrated that @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ reduces mineralization of @<m>DISEASE_Plaque_Atherosclerotic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D058226 @@@atherosclerotic plaque@@@.

results.title: Vascular protection of dual therapy (atorvastatin-amlodipine) in hypertensive patients.
results.text_hl: In this respect, the addition of @CHEMICAL_Atorvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069059 @@@atorvastatin@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ to @<m>DISEASE_Plaque_Atherosclerotic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D058226 @@@atherosclerotic plaques@@@ normalized the levels of the different released proteins to that obtained from healthy arteries.

citations.NLM: Martín-Ventura JL, Tuñon J, Duran MC, Blanco-Colio LM, Vivanco F, Egido J. Vascular protection of dual therapy (atorvastatin-amlodipine) in hypertensive patients. J Am Soc Nephrol. 2006 Dec;17(12 Suppl 3):S189-93. PMID: 17130260

results.title: Vascular and myocardial effects of amlodipine: an overview.
results.text_hl: In the @CHEMICAL_Cholesterol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002784 @@@cholesterol@@@-fed @SPECIES_9986 @@@rabbits@@@ @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ (1 or 5 mg/kg/day) produced a significant, dose-dependent reduction in the incidence of @<m>DISEASE_Plaque_Atherosclerotic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D058226 @@@atheromatous lesions@@@ in the thoracic aorta over an 8-week period.

citations.NLM: Nayler WG, Gu XH. Vascular and myocardial effects of amlodipine: an overview. Postgrad Med J. 1991;67 Suppl 5():S41-3. PMID: 1839439
citations.BibTeX: @article{1839439, title={Vascular and myocardial effects of amlodipine: an overview.}, author={Nayler WG and Gu XH}, journal={Postgrad Med J}, volume={67 Suppl 5}, pages={S41-3}}

results.title: Reduction in infarct size by chronic amlodipine treatment in cholesterol-fed rabbits.
results.text_hl: @CHEMICAL_Calcium @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002118 @@@Calcium@@@ (Ca)-dependent factors, including @CHEMICAL_Cholesterol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002784 @@@cholesterol@@@-induced changes in membrane Ca permeability and Ca deposition into lesions, may contribute to plaque formation and stability during the early and late stages of @DISEASE_Atherosclerosis @DISEASE_MESH:D050197 @@@atherogenesis@@@. @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@Amlodipine@@@ can reduce @<m>DISEASE_Plaque_Atherosclerotic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D058226 @@@atheroma@@@ formation in @CHEMICAL_Cholesterol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002784 @@@cholesterol@@@-fed @SPECIES_9986 @@@rabbits@@@ and may be cardioprotective.

citations.NLM: Hoshida S, Yamashita N, Kuzuya T, Hori M. Reduction in infarct size by chronic amlodipine treatment in cholesterol-fed rabbits. Atherosclerosis. 1998 May;138(1):163-70. PMID: 9678782
citations.BibTeX: @article{9678782, title={Reduction in infarct size by chronic amlodipine treatment in cholesterol-fed rabbits.}, author={Hoshida S and Yamashita N and Kuzuya T and Hori M}, journal={Atherosclerosis}, volume={138}, number={1}, pages={163-70}}

results.title: The effects of antihypertensive agents on atherosclerosis-related parameters of human aorta intimal cells.
results.text_hl: @CHEMICAL_Propranolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D011433 @@@Propranolol@@@ increased all three parameters, while @CHEMICAL_perindoprilat @CHEMICAL_MESH:C053500 @@@perindoprilat@@@ had no effects. In addition, @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Verapamil @CHEMICAL_MESH:D014700 @@@verapamil@@@ significantly lowered the intracellular @CHEMICAL_Cholesterol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002784 @@@cholesterol@@@ content of smooth muscle cells derived from @<m>DISEASE_Plaque_Atherosclerotic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D058226 @@@atherosclerotic plaque@@@ and inhibited cell proliferation and protein synthesis.

citations.NLM: Orekhov AN, Tertov VV, Pivovarova EM. The effects of antihypertensive agents on atherosclerosis-related parameters of human aorta intimal cells. Cardiology. 1998;89(2):111-8. PMID: 9524011
citations.BibTeX: @article{9524011, title={The effects of antihypertensive agents on atherosclerosis-related parameters of human aorta intimal cells.}, author={Orekhov AN and Tertov VV and Pivovarova EM}, journal={Cardiology}, volume={89}, number={2}, pages={111-8}}

results.title: Protecting the vasculature: an eye toward the future.
results.text_hl: Differences include: different pH optimum for receptor binding, different rates of association and dissociation, and differences in allosteric interaction with the @CHEMICAL_Diltiazem @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004110 @@@diltiazem@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Verapamil @CHEMICAL_MESH:D014700 @@@verapamil@@@ binding sites. @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@Amlodipine@@@, when given orally to @SPECIES_9986 @@@rabbits@@@ receiving a high-@CHEMICAL_Cholesterol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002784 @@@cholesterol@@@ diet, reduces @<m>DISEASE_Plaque_Atherosclerotic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D058226 @@@atheroma@@@ formation.

citations.NLM: Nayler WG, Gu XH. Protecting the vasculature: an eye toward the future. Am J Cardiol. 1990 Nov 20;66(18):23H-27H. PMID: 2147359
citations.BibTeX: @article{2147359, title={Protecting the vasculature: an eye toward the future.}, author={Nayler WG and Gu XH}, journal={Am J Cardiol}, volume={66}, number={18}, pages={23H-27H}}
